GTagAnalyticsId.description: Google Analytics account ID (UA-xxxxxxxx-x or G-xxxxxxxx)

GTagAnonymizeIP.description: Anonymize IP addresses sent to Google Analytics

GTagHonorDNT.description: Honor the DNT header indicating a user does not wish to be tracked

GTagTrackSensitivePages.description: Include tracking code on potentially sensitive pages such as UserLogin and Preferences
